contentrichtext.text: '''Maclaurin''' or '''MacLaurin''' (with a capital "L") may refer to: People with the surname '''Maclaurin''': * [[Colin Maclaurin]] (1698–1746), Scottish mathematician * [[Normand MacLaurin]] (1835–1914), Australian politician and university administrator * [[Henry Normand MacLaurin]] (1878–1915), Australian general * [[Ian MacLaurin, Baron MacLaurin of Knebworth]] * [[Richard Cockburn Maclaurin]] (1870–1920), US physicist and educator '''Other''': * [[Taylor series]] in mathematics, a special case of which is the ''Maclaurin series'' * [[Maclaurin (crater)]], a crater on the Moon ==See also== * [[McLaurin (disambiguation)]] * [[MacLaren (surname)]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Surnames]] [[Category:Clan MacLaren]]
